The Nokia has introduced Nokia Lumia 710, Windows Phone that is designed to be affordable. The touchscreen handset runs on Windows Phone 7.5 Mango OS, which supports all kinds of software. Lumia comes with a 1.4 GHz Qualcomm Scorpion Processor with a clock rate speed of 1400 MHz. This is very responsive and thus enhances the performance of the phone. The Nokia handset also supports a 512 MB RAM and has Adreno 205 GPU.

The 3.7-inch TFT LCD touchscreen display screen with 480 x 800 pixel of resolution lets you experience the natural and real colour of the images. Nokia Lumia sports a 5 megapixel camera lens with LED flash light. This helps you to click images and record HD videos through the camera even at night.

The 4x digital focus and 3x video zoom, lets you go closer to subject and get pictures with more clarity. You can also record HD videos with 1280 x 720 pixel resolution at 30 fps. Other camera features like Geo-Tagging, touch focus, continuous auto focus, exposure compensation, auto and manual white balance and image editor provides better quality images.

Design

The face of the phone has a capacitive touchscreen with ClearBlack screen. The phone also has an anti-glare screen with Gorilla Glass display. This helps in having a scratch-resistant screen which enables easy handling of the phone. The camera keys and the volume rockers are situated at the right side of the handset.

The power button, audio connector and the USB port are found at the top of the Lumia. The phone camera and the flashlight are situated at the back of the Nokia handset. This phone also includes features like 3D Accelerometer for UI auto rotate, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor and Digital Compass.

Battery and Storage

Powered by BP-3L 3.7V 1300 mAh Li -Ion battery, the Lumia provides a talk time up to 6 hours in 2G and 7 hours on 3G. When fully charged, the phone provides a standby time up to 400 hours on 2G and 3G. You can play non-stop music on your handset as it provides a music playback up to 38 hours and a video playback up to 6 hours. The phone has an inbuilt memory of up to 8 GB which helps you store files of your choice.

Connectivity and Features

The Nokia Lumia allows you to access the Internet through GPRS, EDGE, 3G and Wi-Fi platforms. You can also browse various sites through the preinstalled browser in the phone. Also, apps for Google Mail, Yahoo Mail and Hotmail allow you to check and send official and personal emails through the phone. Connectivity features like Bluetooth and USB port let you share files with other devices. The Nokia handset also supports USB charging.

You can store your favourite music tracks in the Nokia Lumia and play them in the music player. The FM radio allows you to tune into your favourite channel and get the latest music and news updates. The SNS applications in the Windows Live allow you to stay connected with your friends through Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter. An instant messaging facility in the phone lets you communicate with your friends through Gtalk and Yahoo Messenger. Video streaming applications keep you updated with the latest video releases.

The embedded A-GPS in the Nokia Lumia 710 helps you in finding the desired location while commuting long distances. Apart from this, you can also send MMS to your friends and relatives through the Lumia. Other applications like audio and video stabilization, active noise cancellation, audio recording AAC stereo, Windows Live detailed contact information, Wi-Fi positiong, Nokia drive, Nokia music, Micro SIM, Nokia contacts transfer, dedicated keys and voice input are present in the Lumia 710.
productAttributes.title: Nokia Lumia 710 White

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy Y S5360 is a smartphone with an aesthetically pleasing design. This touchscreen bar phone runs on Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system and possesses an 832 MHz Android browser. A large TFT screen with a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels forms the face of this mobile. The TouchWiz UI on this Samsung phone gives you a colorful user interface experience and the customizable home screens make handling and navigation convenient. A 2 megapixel camera present on the Galaxy Y from Samsung is loaded with 2x zoom. This camera also supports white balance and panorama features that that enables you to take good pictures. You can use photo effects supported on this phone to experiment with your photography.

Design

The Galaxy Y S5360 handset from Samsung is easy to carry and use. This touchscreen phone has dedicated home, back and option keys to help you navigate the pages of your screen with ease. The left side of the phone has volume rockers that let you adjust volume levels on this device. A 3.5 mm audio jack and a USB port are situated on top while the power button is located on the right side of this Samsung phone. The Galaxy Y has an accelerometer and proximity sensor to enhance your experience.

Battery and Storage
A 1200 mAh battery powers this Samsung smartphone that gives you a talk time of up to 6 hours on 2G when fully charged. This phone supports a standby time of up to 120 hours on 2G. The Galaxy Y has an internal memory of 160 MB and is expandable up to 32 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards.

Connectivity and Features

The Galaxy Y smartphone supports GPRS, EDGE, 3G and Wi-Fi platforms to connect to the Internet. You can connect to other devices through Bluetooth and a USB port and share files. The S5360 Samsung phone supports Email and Push Email along with a Document viewer that helps you keep in touch with your work environment at all times. A unique Find my phone feature makes sure that you can trace your mobile even if you lose it.

You can control your phone and lock your phone or delete all the information on it altogether if you wish to. This mobile phone is preloaded with Social hub application that integrates you mails, calendars and information in one place and keeps updated. You can also access social networking sites like Twitter and Facebook with the Galaxy Y S5360. The phone can access the Samsung apps store and Android market to download all the applications that you need. Quicktype by SWIPE on the Galaxy Y allows you to type on this touchscreen with ease.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Y S5360 Pure White
Samsung Galaxy Ace S5830 Pure White, with 2 GB Micro SD Card
Samsung Galaxy Note N-7000 Ceramic White

productAttributes.productDescription:
The K 4 from Karbonn is a stylish bar phone that features easy-to-use screen icons that give you a comfortable mobile experience. The user-friendly interface allows easy use of the applications loaded on the phone. The Dual SIM GSM + GSM phone comes with a 2.4-inch TFT QVGA screen with 240 x 320 pixel resolution, which enhances the visual experience of the user on the phone. The backlit alphanumeric keypad allows effortless texting even in the dark.

The sleek phone sports a 1.3 megapixel camera which allows you to capture and share memories with friends. The phone also possesses a good speaker that adds to your multimedia experience. The phone can record videos and play them in 3GP, AVI and MP4 formats. Despite having many features, the phone weighs only 116 g and measures 50 x 116.5 x 14.8 mm in dimensions.

Battery and Storage

The stylish phone is powered by 2200 mAh Jumbo battery that gives you a marathon talk time of up to 10 hours without any interruptions. When fully charged, the phone gives you a standby time of up to 550 hours. You can store music, videos and images as the phone has an internal memory of 45 KB which can be expanded up to 8 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards. The phone book allows you to store 500 contacts and 100 text messages in the inbox.

Multimedia

The K 4 is loaded with multimedia features like an integrated FM radio and a music player that keep you entertained on the move. You can store your favourite music in the phone and play them from your music library. The phone supports MP3, WAV and MIDI formats. The FM stations keep you updated on the latest music and also let you record songs being aired on to your phone. The preloaded games in the phone keep you engaged while commuting long distances.

Connectivity and Features

The pocket friendly handset lets you access the Internet through the GPRS platform supported on the handset. The preinstalled WAP browser lets you browse various web pages on the go. In addition, the connectivity options like Bluetooth and a USB port allow you to share files like music tracks, videos and images with other devices. The Anti-theft feature helps you locate your phone when you misplace it. The Karbonn handset also features a handy torch which helps you explore places in the dark.
productAttributes.title: Karbonn K 4 Black & Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Wave Y S5380 is a touch based smartphone that flashes a metallic design along with a large and wide display screen. This Samsung phone runs Bada v2.0 operating system on 832 MHz processor promising fast response and a smooth multitasking experience. The single SIM Wave Y S5380 can be used on both 2G and 3G networks allowing you to switch between the networks with the same phone.

The Samsung Wave sports a 3.2 inch TFT screen that supports HVGA resolution of 480 x 320 pixels. This smartphone uses Samsung TouchWiz user interface for Bada operating system allowing you to customise your display with your favourite apps and widgets. It features 3D folder, making the user experience more intuitive and helps in keeping the files in an organized manner. The Samsung smartphone has simplified chatting on mobile with ChatON, a chat application from Samsung that connects all your near and dear ones in one chatting service allowing group chat.

The Wave Y S5380 comes with a 2 megapixel primary camera, which is capable of recording MPEG4 videos at a frame rate of 30 fps. This helps you in getting clear videos. This phone comes pre-loaded with an image editor, allowing you to enhance the quality of the photos that you have clicked, without the use of a computer.

Design

The Samsung Wave adds to your style statement with its metallic finish body embedded with hairline pattern. This ergonomically designed phone accompanied by elusively rounded edges offer you a comfortable grip. This slender looking phone comes with dimensions of 57.9 x 110 x 12.3 mm and weighs 104.8 g. This smartphone from Samsung comes with an accelerometer and proximity sensor.

Storage and Battery

The Samsung Wave Y S5380 promises a talk time of up to 13 hours on 2G network and up to 4 hours on 3G network with its 1200 mAh Li-Ion battery. This phone offers you a standby time of up to 440 hours on 3G network and if you are on 2G network then it may go up to 610 hours. This phone carries 150 MB of internal memory to store your files in phone. However, if you need extra space to store your files, you can insert a microSD card of up to 32 GB storage capacity.

Connectivity and Features

The Samsung Wave Y S5380 is equipped with different connectivity options that are capable of serving almost all sorts of requirement. It incorporates Wi-Fi allowing you to get connected with nearest router and exchange data at fast speeds. To allow you to connect with other Wi-Fi devices without the Internet and share images, videos and other contents, this phone features Wi-Fi Direct. Wi-Fi Direct can also be used to play games with the nearest Wi-Fi enabled device. This Samsung phone is equipped with Bluetooth 3.0 that is up to 8 times faster than the normal Bluetooth device.

Apart from supporting GPRS and EDGE for Internet connectivity, Samsung Wave Y S5380 supports HSDPA 3G that operates at a speed of up to 7.2 Mbps. This smartphone features a microUSB 2.0 that can be used to connect your device to a computer with a data cable. The 3.5 mm jack on Samsung Wave can be used to connect it to a headphone or to an external speaker.

This phone allows you to tune into your favourite channels with FM radio. It comes loaded with A-GPS that enables you to trace your position and required direction with ease. This phone from Samsung is ready to serve your business requirements with Pushmail and Windows Live service. The Samsung Wave gives you access to Samsung app store allowing you to download latest applications.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Wave Y S5380 Sand Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Blackberry 9330 is a light and compact device that tackles all your communication needs. A CDMA handset, the 9330 does not have a separate SIM card slot. This is a bar shaped mobile that comes with QWERTY keypad. The Curve 9330 uses Blackberry 6 operating system with 512 MB of RAM to help you engage in multitasking with efficiency and reduced response time.

The Blackberry Curve 3G is fitted with a 2.46 inch TFT screen supporting QVGA resolution of 320 x 240 pixels. This screen displays clear and sharp graphics with 65,000 possible colour combinations. The Blackberry Curve 9330 flashes a 2 megapixel camera to help you preserve the most precious moments of your life in your handset. You can use this camera to record videos as well.

Design

The Blackberry 9330 is a compact and easy-to-carry device. This phone features a 3.5 mm audio jack and a USB port on the left side of the body. Music keys fitted on the top of the phone allow you to play, pause or fast forward a song, and there is volume rocker on the right side of the phone. To help you easily navigate through the menu, this phone features an optical trackpad just below the screen. After integrating all these features, this phone tips the scale at 104 g with the dimensions of 60 x 109 x 13.9 mm.

Storage and Battery

The Blackberry Curve 3G is powered by 1150 mAh Li-Ion battery that once fully charged offers you a talk time of up to 4 hours and a standby time of up to 252 hours. This phone is ready to meet all your storage related needs with 512 MB of internal memory. As this is a multimedia phone, you will need more space to store all your songs, videos and other files and that is why Blackberry allows you to expand the memory up to 32 GB with microSD card.

Connectivity and Features

The Blackberry Curve offers you 3G support to help you experience fast Internet on your phone. This allows live video streaming thus enabling you to indulge in video chat or to watch television shows on your phone. The Curve comes equipped with Wi-Fi that helps you connect to the nearest Wi-Fi hotspot to browse the Internet on your handset. You can take a break off your routine anywhere to dive in to your virtual profile with the pre-loaded Facebook and Twitter apps. You can check your mails in real time with Pushmail app.

This phone lets you send and receive multimedia messages over the network with the MMS support. You can use Bluetooth to exchange files with other Bluetooth enabled devices. Also you can use microUSB port to exchange files to and fro from your device. Blackberry has loaded the Curve 9330 with A-GPS that works with Blackberry maps to help you roam across a city without anyone to guide you. To keep you entertained at all times, this phone comes to you with multi-format music and video player.
productAttributes.title: BlackBerry 9330 Tata Indicom

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nokia X2-02 is a classy handset with an alphanumeric keypad that is built in to one stylish frame. This phone runs on Series 40 operating system. This Nokia X2 series phone has a 2.2-inch TFT QVGA screen with a resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. The Nokia X2-02 is a Dual SIM GSM + GSM with a dual standby feature that gives you the power to choose who you stay in touch with. This Nokia phone also has 32 MB RAM loaded under its hood.

The Nokia X2-02 mobile is loaded with a 2 megapixel camera with 4x zoom. The camera is enabled with a self-timer that lets you be part of all your pictures clicked with friends. You can also record videos at 10 fps on this Nokia phone. This Nokia phone has a CMOS sensor loaded on to it. The handset weighs a mere 93 g and measures 50 x 113 x 15 mm, making it a comfortable device to carry with you at all times.

Battery and Storage

This Nokia phone has powered by a Li-Ion 1020 mAh battery that gives you a stunning talk time of 9 hours and a standby time of 443 hours. The Nokia X2-02 has an inbuilt memory of 10 MB and is expandable up to 32 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards. The Nokia X2-02 also possesses 64 MB ROM.

Multimedia

The Nokia X2-02 has an integrated music player with a dedicated music key that is capable of playing your favorite music on demand. The music player on this phone supports MP3 and WAV formats. You can also watch videos that you have recorded or loaded on to your phone in MP4, WMV, H.263, 3GPP and ASF formats. The FM radio with recording option lets you tune in to your favorite radio stations on the go and record those tunes that you want to store on your mobile straight off the air waves. A 3.5 mm audio jack on the phone lets you connect headphones of your choice and get good quality audio output.

Connectivity and Features

This Nokia X2 series phone from Nokia supports GPRS and EDGE platforms with which you can connect to the Internet. The preinstalled Opera Mini browser lets you surf the pages of the web effectively. The Email facility enabled on the phone meets your professional and personal needs comfortably. The phone also supports social networking websites like Facebook and Twitter along with loads of other sites like Wikipedia, Instant Messaging, Gmail, Hot Mail and Yahoo Mail that keep you constantly connected.

Bluetooth and a micro USB facility supported on this mobile let you connect and share files with other compatible devices seamlessly. The Nokia X2-02 has an organizer that lets you plan your day in great detail. This phone supports many other applications and features that will simplify your tasks and meet your communication demands in style.
productAttributes.title: Nokia X2-02 Bright Red

productAttributes.productDescription:
Samsung has assembled some of the most sought after features in Galaxy Pop Plus S5570i to optimise it for an enhanced user experience. This mobile comes in a bar-shape and has packaged Android v2.2 Froyo operating system under the hood to efficiently deal with multi-tasking. Additionally, an 832 MHz processor has tremendously reduced the response time and has boosted the overall performance of this device.

This mobile phone has been fitted with a 3.14 inch capacitive touchscreen that is highly sensitive and responds quickly to your instructions. This screen utilises QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels to reflect graphics and images with minute details and vibrant colours. This phone has been equipped with TouchWiz 3.0 user interface that simplifies the entire user experience and gives you a bounty of options to customise the home screen and other display features according to your needs.

This mobile phone has been fitted with a 3 megapixel camera that promises to help you click clear and impressive visuals that too, with finest details. As this phone camera supports 3x digital zoom, you get an option to focus on any particular object for a close shot. Additionally, this phone features an image editor to help you enhance the quality of the photos that you have clicked. Also, this phone camera supports video recording at 15 fps to help you record clear and impressive videos of the joyous moments of your life. Other features supported by this phone camera include shot mode, photo effects and white balance.

Design

This ergonomically designed phone comes with a sleek finish and has integrated a wealth of design features that make it trendy. This mobile phone comes loaded with a proximity sensor that automatically turns off the screen while you are on a call to avoid any accidental touch. Further, the accelerometer bears the responsibility of changing the layout of the screen from portrait to landscape and vice versa depending on the positioning of the handset. Also, this phone comes with a digital compass. This mobile phone has integrated all these features to conveniently fit in your palm with the dimensions of 60.6 x 110.4 x 12.1 mm.

Storage and Battery

This mobile phone comes loaded with a 1200 mAh Li-Ion battery that enables this phone to deliver a talk time of up to 9 hours and 6 hours on 2G and 3G networks, respectively. This mobile features sufficient space to meet all your storage related requirements. This phone comes with 164 MB of internal memory to store all your important files and documents on the phone memory itself. Also, you can expand the memory of thisSamsung Galaxy phone up to 32 GB with a microSD card to house all your favourite multimedia files that you would like to carry with you while you are on-the-move.

Connectivity and Features

Samsung has packaged most of the connectivity features to ensure round the clock connectivity that too, with ease. This GPRS and EDGE enabled Galaxy Pop Plus S5570i allows you to board the virtual world from any place at any point of time while you are present on 2G network. However, if you are present on 3G network then you can surf the Internet at lightning fast speed as this Samsung handset is 3G enabled. This handset allows you to utilise the nearest available WiFi hotspot to dive into the world of Internet as it is WiFi enabled. Also, this phone features Android browser for a simplified browsing experience. As this phone supports A-GPS with Google maps, you can explore a completely unknown city without seeking anyone’s help.

This mobile supports both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files and documents with other devices in your immediate vicinity. This MMS enabled phone helps you to send and receive multimedia messages across the distance with the help of the network. This phone supports multi-format audio player to help you enjoy your favourite music even while you are away from your home. Also, there is a video player to let you watch your favourite movie that too, on your handset. This phone features apps for Google Talk, Instant messaging and Swype for ease of access to the virtual world.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Pop Plus S5570i Steel Grey

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus S7500 is a well-crafted smartphone that has beautifully integrated most of the features to deliver an outstanding performance. The bar-shaped Galaxy Ace Plus runs Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system with 512 MB of RAM to deliver a rich user experience. Further, 1 GHz Qualcomm Scorpion Processor has eased the transition between the applications and has notably reduced the response time. On the whole, this configuration promises to efficiently support multi-tasking.

The Ace Plus features a 3.65 inch TFT capacitive touchscreen that reproduces graphics and images with HVGA resolution of 320 x 480 pixels. Additionally, this screen emanates vivid colours as it is able to identify 16 M different colour combinations. This smartphone comes with TouchWiz user interface that promises a simplified and intuitive user experience. On the top of this, Adreno 200 graphics processor reflects vibrant graphics to add on to the rich user experience.

The Android based Samsung phone sports a 5 megapixel camera that makes you camera ready for capturing the unforgettable moments in impressive visuals. This camera is complemented by an LED flash to help you get clear visuals even in dim light. The Ace Plus is equipped with an image editor to let you enhance the quality of the photos that you have clicked. This phone camera lets you record videos with 640 x 480 pixels of resolution and that too, at 30 fps. This mobile supports geo-tagging, face and smile detection and auto focus.

Design

This Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus sports a trendy look with a sleek finish. The backside of this Samsung mobile phone is made up of shiny plastic and it sports the camera, flash and the speaker grill. The top side of this phone features a 3.5 mm headphone jack and the bottom side houses a pinhole mic and USB port. Power button rests on the right side of this sturdy looking device. The left side of this phone is fitted with the volume rocker. This is a compact device that conveniently fits in your palm with the dimensions of 62.5 x 114.7 x 11.2 mm.

Storage and Battery

The Android based Samsung Galaxy phone is powered by a 1300 mAh Li-ion battery that, once fully recharged, promises to efficiently take care of all the applications for a sufficiently long period of use. This Samsung Galaxy phone offers you 4 GB of internal memory to store all your important files and data on the phone memory itself. However, you can always expand the memory of this device up to 32 GB with a microSD card.

Connectivity and Features

The Android based Galaxy Ace Plus has incorporated most of the connectivity features that smoothens your interaction with the world around you. This phone is both GPRS and EDGE enabled to fetch you Internet connectivity on 2G network. This phone is 3G enabled to offer you a bounty of benefits that the 3G network promises including faster browsing experience. Additionally, this phone gives you the alternative to use the nearest Wi-Fi hotspot for Internet connectivity as it is Wi-Fi enabled. This Samsung mobile phone comes loaded with accelerometer and digital compass.

This device supports both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files and data with other devices present in your immediate vicinity. This Samsung smartphone supports A-GPS with Google maps to help you easily navigate through an unknown city. Further, on-board you will find document viewer and document editor that helps you create and edit files and documents that, otherwise, would require a computer. The Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus comes loaded with apps for Social Hub, Gmail and Youtube. You can access the Android market from this device and download the latest apps.

This Samsung mobile phone comes loaded with a multi-format audio and video player to take care of your entertainment related needs. However, you have an alternative to tune into the nearest channels and to listen to your favourite shows with the in-built FM Radio. This Samsung Galaxy phone is MMS enabled to send and receive multi-media messages over the network.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Ace Plus S7500 Dark Blue

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Intex Avatar 3D has incorporated a wealth of features in a sleek design that keeps it in sync with the trend. The bar-shaped Avatar 3D comes fitted with a touchscreen that promises you a rich user experience with a simplified user interface. Additionally, this phone supports 3D user interface that gives you a lot more intuitive experience. This is a dual SIM Intex phone that has been devised to work on 2G network with GSM SIM cards. This mobile phone comes equipped with a 2.8 inch screen that occupies most of the space on the front panel. This screen supports QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. As it can reproduce 262 K different colour combinations, you will notice that the graphics and the images are emanating vibrant colours.

The Avatar 3D comes loaded with dedicated apps for Messenger, eBuddy and Facebook to take you closer to your friends and family in the virtual world. You will find a 2 megapixel camera at the back of this handset to help you click impressive visuals of people and places you treasure the most. This camera is accompanied by a flash to get you clear photos even in dim light. Also, you can use this camera to record videos at 6.2 fps. You can even opt to use this mobile camera as a webcam. This mobile phone occupies 55 x 102 x 12 mm of space and it tips the scale at 116 g.

Battery and Storage

This Intex handset is powered by an 1100 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises to deliver a talk time of up to 4 hours and a standby time of up to 400 hours. This phone efficiently takes care of your storage related needs. This phone can store up to 500 text messages thus eliminating the need to frequently delete the previous messages to make way for the new ones. Also, this phone comes with a sufficiently larger phonebook to hold 2000 contacts thus helping you to organize your contacts in a better way. This Intex mobile phone comes with 67 MB of internal memory to house your important files in the phone memory itself. However, you can always expand the memory of this phone up to 32 GB with a microSD card to make space for the audio and video files that you want to carry along with you.

Multimedia

The Intex Avatar 3D has bundled a bounty of entertainment features to keep you occupied during your leisure time. This mobile phone is loaded with a music player that supports MP3 and WAV formats. Also, this phone comes with a video player that plays MP4, 3GP and AVI format based videos. However, if you prefer listening to your favourite shows on radio then this handset meets your requirement with an in-built FM Radio. You can even opt to record a live show on the Radio to listen to it at a later point of time. This phone is equipped with a sound recorder to help you record any conversation. This handset sports a 3.5 mm audio jack to let you listen to your favourite track through your headphone or an external speaker. Also, this phone comes with pre-loaded games to let you engage in gaming during your free time. This Intex mobile phone renders support to 3D images and movies.

Connectivity and Features

The Intex Avatar 3D has been equipped with a range of connectivity features to ensure smooth connection to the world of Internet or to other devices in your vicinity. The Intex Avatar 3D is GPRS and EDGE enabled to get you Internet connection on 2G network. For a smooth browsing experience, this handset features Opera Mini web browser. You can use this mobile as a modem to get your computer connected to the Internet. To help you exchange files and data with other devices in your immediate vicinity, this device supports both Bluetooth and USB. The Intex Avatar sports a torch light that efficiently clears darkness to reveal your way through it. This mobile features dedicated apps for MSN, Google, Yahoo and Nimbuzz.
productAttributes.title: Intex Avatar 3D White

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Samsung Galaxy Y Duos S6102 is a beautiful combination of aesthetics and functionality that gets you in limelight for both style and performance. The dual SIM phone from Samsung can accommodate two GSM SIM cards in its bar-shaped body to fetch you connectivity on both 2G and 3G networks. The Galaxy Y duos runs Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system on an 832 MHz processor to offer you fast and smooth multi-tasking experience.

This Samsung Galaxy phone has been fitted with a 3.14 inch screen to display graphics and images with QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. The presence of TouchWiz user interface on this Android based Samsung phone makes for an intuitive and user-friendly experience. This device has been pre-loaded with apps for Facebook, Twitter and Social Hub to offer you the flexibility to check in your virtual life from any location at any point of time. Additionally, this device features Samsung's proprietary ChatON application that offers simplified chatting experience on mobile.

The Samsung S6102 is equipped with a 3 megapixels camera to make you camera ready for clicking and preserving the precious moments in your handheld device. With the help of geo-tagging, you can opt to tag the location where you have clicked a particular photo for ease of recall at a later point of time. Additionally, there is an image editor to help you enhance the quality of a photo you have clicked. Also, you can use this camera for video recording at 24 fps.

Design

This Android based phone has been ergonomically designed to sport an attractive look. The capacitive touchscreen occupies the maximum space on the front panel leaving out small space to accommodate the proximity sensor on the top and the Android shortcut keys for easy navigation on the bottom. The back side of this Samsung phone features glossy finish and is embedded with the camera and a speaker grill. You will find the volume rocker on the left side and the power button on the right side of this mobile phone. The top side of this phone houses a 3.5 mm headphone jack to let you plug in your headphone or a portable speaker for an enhanced listening experience. This mobile phone features the microUSB port on the bottom side.

Storage and Battery

This performance oriented Samsung phone comes loaded with a powerful battery and a lot of storage space to meet your requirement. This Samsung phone is powered by a 1300 mAh Li-Ion battery to fuel a talk time of up to 17 hours and 6 hours on 2G and 3G networks, respectively. This phone can easily store your files and documents as it has 160 MB of internal storage space. However, you can expand the memory up to 32 GB with a microSD card to carry all your favourite multimedia files with you and tune into it even while you are travelling.

Connectivity and Features

The Galaxy Y Duos S6102 has integrated a range of connectivity features to keep you connected with your friends and family irrespective of your location. The GPRS and EDGE enabled Samsung phone lets you browse the world of Internet on your handheld device while you are present on 2G network. However, if you are present on 3G network then you can experience lightning fast browsing on this Samsung handset as it is 3G enabled.

This WiFi enabled Samsung Duos S6102 lets you connect with the nearest WiFi hotspot and browse the world of Internet on your handheld device. This mobile phone features Android browser for a simplified and faster browsing experience. This mobile phone is loaded with document viewer to help you edit and access MS office based files on your phone. The pushmail feature helps you to send and receive emails in real time.

This Samsung phone features both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files with other devices in your surrounding area. The Samsung Galaxy Y duos supports A-GPS with Google maps to help you find your way to the destination in an unknown location. This mobile phone is equipped with a multi-format audio and video player to be a powerhouse of entertainment. Further, this mobile phone incorporated accelerometer and digital compass related sensors.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Y Duos S6102 Strong Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Nokia X2-02 is a sturdy looking phone that has been optimised to deliver a superior music experience. This is a bar-shaped phone that runs on Series 40 operating system that offers you an intuitive user experience. An alphanumeric keypad helps you to key-in instructions with ease. The dual SIM Nokia phone has been devised for use on 2G network with two GSM SIM cards. This phone comes equipped with Nokia's swap support that lets you change the SIM while the phone is switched on.

The X2-02 comes fitted with a 2.2 inch LCD transmissive screen that reproduces images and graphics with QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. This phone comes loaded with a 2 megapixel camera to make you camera ready for the unexpected moments that you don't want to miss out on. Additionally, this camera supports 4x digital zoom to let you take a closer shot of an object in the frame. This camera supports video recording at 10 fps and with a resolution of 176 x 144 pixels. This phone is equipped with CMOS sensor. This mobile phone has bundled all these features within the dimensions of 50 x 113 x 15 mm and it weighs 93 g.

Battery and Storage

 The Nokia X2-02 is powered by a 1020 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises up to 9 hours of talk time and up to 443 hours of standby time. This phone efficiently takes care of your storage related needs with an aptly large memory for storing SMSes and contacts. Additionally, this device offers 10 MB of internal memory for hosting your files and data on the phone itself. The X2-02 has integrated 32 MB of RAM and 64 MB of ROM for an enhanced performance and a reduced response time. However, the memory is expandable up to 32 GB with a microSD card to help you store your favourite audio and video files.

Multimedia

The Nokia X2-02 claims to be an ideal companion for those who are crazy about music. This phone has bundled a music player that supports MP3, WAV and MIDI format based files. Also, there is a video player that supports MP4, WMV, 3GPP and ASF file formats. This Nokia mobile phone sports a 3.5 mm headphone jack that lets you play music through your headphone or an external speaker. However, if you are interested in listening to your favourite shows on the radio then this phone is just for you with an in-built FM Radio that supports recording of the live shows as well. This Nokia handset comes with pre-loaded games to let you engage in gaming during your leisure time.

Connectivity and Features

The Nokia X2-02 comes equipped with most of the connectivity features that you would be willing to have in your handset. The GPRS and EDGE enabled X2-02 ensures Internet connectivity at all points of time by using the 2G spectrum present in your vicinity. For a simplified browsing experience, this phone comes loaded with Opera Mini web browser. This Nokia phone supports both Bluetooth and USB to help you send and receive files to and fro from your device. This Nokia phone is MMS enabled to help you send and receive multimedia messages over the network. This Nokia phone comes loaded with apps for Gmail, Hot Mail and Yahoo Mail to help you conveniently access your mailbox. Also, this phone comes with apps for Facebook, Twitter and instant messaging to keep you in touch with your friends and family at all points of time.
productAttributes.title: Nokia X2-02 Dark Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Galaxy Ace Duos I589 is the latest addition to the existing line of dual SIM phones from Samsung. This is a bar shaped mobile phone that features card slots to accommodate both CDMA and GSM SIM cards. The dual SIM feature of this handset allows you to stay connected on both the SIM cards, at the same time. Additionally, this OMH enabled Galaxy phone gives you the freedom to choose any CDMA operator of your choice. So you don’t need to buy it from particular vendor and stay bounded by the contract.

The Galaxy Ace Duos runs Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system on an 800 MHz processor to deliver both smooth multi-tasking and a rich user experience. This Samsung mobile phone reflects graphics and images on a 3.5 inch TFT screen that supports HVGA resolution of 320 x 480 pixels. This is a capacitive touchscreen that quickly responds to your instructions for ease of usage. Further, Samsung’s TouchWiz user interface offers you user friendly and intuitive experience.

The Samsung Ace Duos comes fitted with a 3.15 megapixel camera to help you capture the unforgettable moments of your life in impressive visuals. You can even opt to record a video with this mobile camera and relive the most cherished moments of your life in these moving frames. On the plus side, this mobile camera supports features like geo-tagging, auto focus and image editor. Apart from all these features, this Samsung mobile phone takes you closer to your virtual world with pre-loaded apps for Gmail, Twitter, Google Talk and MySpace.

Design

The Samsung Galaxy Duos has been beautifully crafted to be an outstanding combination of style and functionality. The front-panel of this mobile phone is occupied by a large screen that leaves some space to accommodate the shortcut keys for ease of navigation. Also, proximity sensor is embedded on the front panel that turns off the screen while you are on a call to avoid any unwanted touch. Additionally, this phone is loaded with accelerometer and digital compass. This device houses the power rocker on the left side and a power button on the right side. You will find a 3.5 mm headphone jack on this mobile phone that helps you to plug in your headphone or an external speaker for an enhanced listening experience.

Storage and Battery

The Samsung Galaxy Ace Duos has been powered by a 1650 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises to deliver a talk time of up to 7 hours on 2G network and a standby time of up to 300 hours on 2G network. This mobile phone has been loaded with sufficient memory space to meet all your storage related requirements. This Samsung Galaxy mobile phone allows you to expand the memory up to 32 GB with a microSD card to accommodate all your favourite audio video files that you would like to tune into while you are travelling.

Connectivity and Features

This Samsung mobile phone has integrated a wealth of connectivity features to eliminate distance between you and your friends and family. This GPRS and EDGE enabled Samsung phone allows you to connect to the world of Internet while you are present on 2G network. However, if you are on 3G network then this phone will help you to surf Internet on a lightning fast speed as it is 3G enabled.

This phone allows you to utilise the nearest WiFi hotspot to get connected to the Internet as the Ace Duos is WiFi enabled. This Samsung I589 helps you to find your way through an unknown city with the help of A-GPS support with Google maps. With this phone in hand, you can exchange files and data with other devices in your immediate vicinity within seconds as it supports both Bluetooth and USB.

The MMS enabled Samsung handset helps you to send and receive multimedia messages with the mediation of the network. This phone has been equipped with an e-Book reader to let you enjoy reading your favourite book even while you are on the move. Additionally, to meet your entertainment related needs, this mobile phone features a multi-format music and video player.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Ace Duos I589 Metallic Grey

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Karbonn KT 60 is an aesthetically designed mobile phone that comes bundled with an abundant number of features to be an ideal companion. The bar-shaped mobile phone is loaded with both an alphanumeric keypad and a resistive touchscreen to simplify your interaction with the device. A resistive touchscreen is made of 3 layers and requires you to put pressure on it to sense the area of touch. The resistive touchscreen works with any pointing devices like stylus, pen, or even nail. The use of pointing device makes the touchscreen usage more accurate.

The dual SIM KT 60 has been designed to accommodate two GSM SIM cards to work on 2G network. This Karbonn mobile phone has been fitted with a 2.6 inch TFT screen that utilises a QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels to reflect clear and crisp visuals. This mobile phone from Karbonn comes equipped with a primary digital camera to help you preserve the unforgettable moments in impressive visuals on this phone. Also, this camera supports video recording. This compact and trendy looking mobile phone comes with the dimensions of 52 x 107.5 x 13.2 mm.

Battery and Storage

The Karbonn KT 60 houses a 1400 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises to support a talk time of up to 5 hours and a standby time of up to 350 hours. This mobile has integrated enough storage space to store all your important files and documents. This phone can store up to 200 text messages thus eliminating the need to delete the old ones in order to make way for the new ones. You get to organize all your contacts in a better way as this phone can hold 500 contacts. Further, you can store all your favourite multimedia files on this phone as you can expand the memory up to 8 GB with a microSD card.

Multimedia

The Karbonn KT 60 has been integrated a bounty of multimedia features to be a powerhouse of entertainment. This mobile phone comes to you with a music player that supports MP3, MIDI and WAV formats. Further, this mobile phone features a video player that supports MP4, 3GP and AVI formats. However, if you are more interested in listening to the RJ talk and shows on Radio then this phone is just for you with an in-built FM Radio. Additionally, this Karbonn handset gives you the freedom to record a live show on radio and listen to it at a later point of time. This handset sports a 3.5 mm audio jack that lets you plug in your headphone or an external speaker for an enhanced listening experience.

Connectivity and Features

The Karbonn KT 60 is GPRS enabled to help you access the Internet from your mobile phone. This mobile phone supports both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files and documents with other devices in your surrounding area. To help you send and receive multimedia messages across the distance then you can seek the help of network as this is MMS enabled mobile phone. The KT 60 has integrated a torch light that is highly efficient to illuminate your way through darkness.
productAttributes.title: Karbonn KT 60 Black & Grey

The Karbonn Symphony is a bar-shaped phone that has incorporated a bounty of communication features to keep you connected to the world at large. This mobile phone comes fitted with an alphanumeric keypad for a simplified user interface. The Symphony reflects graphics and images on 2.4 inch TFT screen that supports a QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. You get to experience vibrant colours emanating from the images as this screen can identify 256 K unique colour combinations.

The dual SIM Karbonn Symphony has been equipped with two card slots to accommodate two GSM SIM cards. This mobile sports a 0.3 megapixel camera to help you preserve the unforgettable moments in impressive visuals. You can tell your story in your own way with the Symphony as it supports video recording as well. Additionally, you can access different file formats with this device as it lends support to multiple image formats.

The Karbonn Symphony has been loaded with a 1000 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises a talk time of up to 3 hours and a standby time of up to 300 hours. This phone comes with adequate space to take care of your storage related requirements. This mobile phone can hold up to 1000 contacts thus giving you an opportunity to organize your professional and personal contacts in an efficient manner. This phone can store 500 text messages thus eliminating the need to frequently delete the old messages. This phone allows you to carry all your multimedia files with you as you can expand the memory up to 4 GB with a microSD card to accommodate them.

Multimedia

Karbonn has integrated a wealth of entertainment related features in this mobile phone to make it an efficient handheld device. This handset houses a music player that supports MP3, MIDI and WAV formats based file. This music player rests at the distance of just one touch for ease of access. Also, there is a video player that supports MP4 and 3GP formats and is accessible with just one click. However, if you are more interested in listening to the live shows being played on the nearest radio stations then you can use the in-built FM Radio. Additionally, this mobile phone gives you an option to record live shows on radio and listen to it at a later point of time. This mobile phone features a 3.5 mm audio jack to let you plug in your headphone or an external speaker for an immersive listening experience.

Connectivity and Features

This GPRS enabled Karbonn mobile phone lets you use the 2G network to browse the world of Internet on your phone. You can send and receive multimedia message across the distance with the mediation of network as the Symphony is MMS enabled. This handset has integrated both Bluetooth and USB to help you exchange files and documents with other devices in your surrounding area.

The KT 51 is a bar-shaped phone launched by Karbonn that has integrated some of the most sought-after features. This mobile phone sports a 2.4 inch TFT screen that reflects graphics and images with a QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. The dual SIM Karbonn mobile phone has been devised to accommodate two GSM SIM cards to fetch you connectivity on 2G network.

This phone is fitted with a resistive touchscreen that is made up of 3 layers and requires you to put pressure on it to sense the area of touch. This mobile phone has been loaded with a digital primary camera to help you click impressive visuals of the unforgettable moments. You can use this camera for video recording as well. With storage space for up to 500 contacts, this mobile phone gives you the freedom to organize your contacts in a better way. Further, this phone can hold up to 200 text messages thus eliminating the need to frequently delete the old messages to create space for the new ones. When it comes to storing multimedia files, this phone allows you to expand the phone memory up to 8 GB in order to accommodate your favourite audio and video files.

Multimedia

This mobile phone has incorporated a range of multimedia features to be a complete entertainer that is with you at all times. Also, this phone has bundled a video player that supports MP4, 3GP and AVI format based video files. The KT 51 sports a 3.5 mm audio jack to let you plug in a headphone or an external speaker for an enriched audio experience. Further, this mobile phone comes loaded with an in-built FM Radio with recording feature that lets you to tune into the nearest radio station and listen or even record live shows.

Connectivity and Features

The Karbonn KT 51 comes equipped with a range of connectivity features to get you connected to the world. You can even opt to use this mobile phone as a modem to connect your computer to the world of Internet. To help you exchange files and documents with other devices in your surrounding area, this phone supports both Bluetooth and USB. The Samsung Star 3 Duos S5222 is an elegantly designed phone that has been loaded with a bunch of features to enhance your performance. There is a 3 inch capacitive touchscreen fitted on this compact and lightweight Samsung phone that comes in a bar shape. Additionally, this screen supports QVGA resolution of 240 x 320 pixels to boost the picture quality. You will find that this phone features a virtual QWERTY keyboard to simplify your interaction with the device. This phone is powered by Samsung’s proprietary TouchWiz Lite 2.0 user interface that enhances the overall user experience.

The Samsung Star 3 comes embedded with a 3 megapixel camera that supports a set of features to help you get clear and crisp visuals of the most cherished moments. This camera supports 2x zoom to let you take a close shot of an object in the frame. Also, this camera supports video recording at 15 fps to let you record the beautiful moments of your life in impressive videos. The Star 3 Duos is a dual standby SIM phone that can accommodate two GSM SIM cards to keep you connected with your near and dear ones. This phone is easy to handle and sports an attractive look with the dimensions of 58 x 102 x 11.5 mm and weighs 95 g.

Battery and Storage

This Samsung mobile phone hosts a 1000 mAh Li-Ion battery that promises to deliver a talk time of up to 14 hours and a standby time of up to 520 hours. This mobile phone features enough space to house all your important files and documents. The internal memory of 20 MB is ready to hold important files on the phone memory itself. However, if your files are exceeding the internal memory then you can expand the memory up to 16 GB with a microSD card. Further, this mobile phone can store 1000 contacts thus assisting you to organize your contacts in a better way for ease of retrieval. Also, this mobile phone can store 500 text messages, hence you are not frequently alerted to clear your inbox in order to make way for the new ones.

Multimedia

This Star 3 Duos S5222 comes loaded with a music player that helps you to tune into audio files based on MP3 and WAV formats. In addition to this, you will find a multi-format video player that allows you to watch your favourite video while you are away from your home. This phone lets you to listen to your favourite shows on the nearest radio channels with the help of in-built FM Radio. You can opt to record live radio with the help of FM recording feature supported by this phone. For an enhanced audio quality, you can connect the 3.5 mm audio jack with the headphone or an external speaker. However, if you are fond of games during your leisure time then this phone is just for you with pre-loaded games.

Connectivity and Features

The GPRS and EDGE enabled Samsung phone helps you to browse the world of Internet from anywhere at any point of time. Further, the presence of Opera Mini web browser enhances your browsing experience. This phone is WiFi enabled to help you utilise the nearest WiFi hotspot to connect with the world of Internet on your mobile phone. To simplify your overall browsing experience, this phone sports dedicated apps for Facebook, Twitter, Yahoo, MSN, Google Talk and ChatON messenger.

To help you exchange files and data with other devices in your immediate vicinity, this phone supports Bluetooth and USB. Also, this mobile phone is MMS enabled to help you send and receive multimedia messages over the network. With the help of document viewer, this mobile phone allows you to access MS Office based files on your handset. This Samsung handset supports pushmail feature to help you send and receive emails in real time.

The Samsung Galaxy Y S5360 is a smartphone with an aesthetically pleasing design. This touchscreen bar phone runs on Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system and possesses an 832 MHz Android browser. A large TFT screen with a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels forms the face of this mobile. The TouchWiz UI on this Samsung phone gives you a colorful user interface experience and the customizable home screens make handling and navigation convenient. A 2 megapixel camera present on the Galaxy Y from Samsung is loaded with 2x zoom. This camera also supports white balance and panorama features that that enables you to take good pictures. You can use photo effects supported on this phone to experiment with your photography.

Design

The Galaxy Y S5360 handset from Samsung is easy to carry and use. This touchscreen phone has dedicated home, back and option keys to help you navigate the pages of your screen with ease. The left side of the phone has volume rockers that let you adjust volume levels on this device. A 3.5 mm audio jack and a USB port are situated on top while the power button is located on the right side of this Samsung phone. The Galaxy Y has an accelerometer and proximity sensor to enhance your experience.

Battery and Storage

A 1200 mAh battery powers this Samsung smartphone that gives you a talk time of up to 6 hours on 2G when fully charged. This phone supports a standby time of up to 120 hours on 2G. The Galaxy Y has an internal memory of 160 MB and is expandable up to 32 GB using microSD, microSDHC cards.

Connectivity and Features

The Galaxy Y smartphone supports GPRS, EDGE, 3G and Wi-Fi platforms to connect to the Internet. You can connect to other devices through Bluetooth and a USB port and share files. The S5360 Samsung phone supports Email and Push Email along with a Document viewer that helps you keep in touch with your work environment at all times. A unique Find my phone feature makes sure that you can trace your mobile even if you lose it.

You can control your phone and lock your phone or delete all the information on it altogether if you wish to. This mobile phone is preloaded with Social hub application that integrates you mails, calendars and information in one place and keeps updated. You can also access social networking sites like Twitter and Facebook with the Galaxy Y S5360. The phone can access the Samsung apps store and Android market to download all the applications that you need. Quicktype by SWIPE on the Galaxy Y allows you to type on this touchscreen with ease.
productAttributes.title: Samsung Galaxy Y S5360 Absolute Black

The Lava KKT 34i is a sturdy and compact phone which is designed to meet your communication needs. The Dual SIM GSM + GSM feature gives you the advantage of using two network connections in one handset. The alphanumeric keypad on the Lava facilitates texting with ease. The sleek phone measures 51.2 x 113.5 x 16 mm in dimensions as it easily fits into your hand.

This KKT 34i handset features a 2.4-inch QVGA TFT display that allows you to view images at a resolution of 240 x 320 pixels. The 0.3 megapixel primary camera lets you click high quality images on the move. This presence of phone camera doesn’t let you miss any special moment in your life. This phone camera also allows you to record videos and play them in 3GP, MP4 and AVI formats. Packed with so many features, the Lava KKT 34i easily fits into your pocket and helps you keep in touch with your friends throughout the day.

Battery and Storage

Powered by 1800 mAh Li-Ion battery, the Lava KKT 34i helps you experience long hours of conversation without any interruption. You can store videos, images and music tracks as the phone memory can be expanded up to 8 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards. You no longer need to delete conversations from your inbox as the phone memory allows you to store 200 messages in the inbox. In addition, you can also store 300 contacts in the phonebook of this sturdy handset.

Multimedia

This compact phone is loaded with a music player which allows you to enjoy your favourite tracks stored in your handset. The player supports music tracks in MP3, MIDI and WAV formats. The pocketable device also gives you the option of tuning into your favourite FM stations on the go. The scheduled FM recording facility in the Lava lets you record your favourite songs played on the air. A 3.5 mm audio jack in the trendy phone allows you to use any generic headphones. This phone from Lava helps you play music on the loudspeaker.

Connectivity and Features

The Lava KKT 34i lets you to access the Internet through the GPRS platform. The preinstalled browser lets you browse various web pages on the handset. You can share music, videos and images through the USB port and Bluetooth connectivity enabled on this device. The twin LED torch present in the KKT provides better visibility in the dark and comes handy.

The privacy protection facility installed in this Lava phone helps you lock your personal information. This compact device from Lava also lets you create a phone backup where you can store all important information. With the auto call recording facility, you can record important conversation and create a backup for it. The bar phone also includes the alarm clock facility which lets you set up alarm and wake up to it. The Hindi and English support on the Lava KKT 34i makes texting and handling of the phone easier.
productAttributes.title: Lava KKT 34i Black & Silver

productAttributes.productDescription:
With the new BlackBerry Curve 9220, you can experience easy to use features that help keeping up with your friends and family simpler. The sleek phone easily fits into your hand so texting on the well-spaced backlit QWERTY keyboard is fun. This stylish handset runs on BlackBerry 7.1 OS which is packed with powerful pre-installed applications. The advanced next generation OS delivers smooth and fast browsing on the Blackberry Curve.

The GSM Curve features a 2.44-inch TFT LCD screen on which you can view QVGA pictures at a resolution of 320 x 240 pixels. The Curve has a 512 MB RAM module which offers optimum performance. With the slim BlackBerry Curve, you can also capture the memorable moments of your life by a 2 megapixel camera which also features 5x zoom. You can record videos while on the move and avoid blurred videos as the phone camera comprises of fixed focus.

Design

The slender BlackBerry Curve 9220 has a plastic body with a rubber buttons on the edge of the phone. The backlight behind the keyboard makes texting easy even in the dark. You can do all kinds of navigation with the help of the touch sensitive optical trackpad. The Blackberry 9220 features a 3.5 mm audio jack that helps you to use any generic headphones on the go. The slim phone easily slips into your pocket thereby making the handset convenient to carry.

The back of the curve features the phone camera. The BlackBerry Curve 9220 features sensors like Accelerometer for UI auto-rotate and Proximity sensor for auto turn-off. The digital compass enabled in the handset helps you determine direction to the desired location.

Battery and Storage

The Curve 9220 is powered by a Lithium-ion 1450 mAh battery, which provides a talk time up to 7 hours. Music lovers can now enjoy their favourite tracks on the phone for up to 28 hours. When fully charged, the Blackberry Curve provides a standby time up to 432 hours, so that you can get things done and stay connected to your friends without worrying about the battery backup. The slim and stylish 9220 Curve can store music, images and videos as the internal memory can expand up to 32 GB using microSD or microSDHC cards.

Connectivity and Features

With the BlackBerry 9220, you can stay in touch with your friends and family through Wi-Fi, GPRS and EDGE platforms. No matter where you are, you can keep tab on what's happening around the world by accessing Internet on the phone. This stylish handset also helps you check your emails and view document on the move. The pushmail facility in the Blackberry Curve helps you check emails from any account just by the click of a button.

Connectors like Bluetooth and USB port help you to exchange music and other files from other devices. You can get connected instantly to your friends and do program interaction through the dedicated BlackBerry Messenger BBM key present in your handset. The 9220 Curve is also enabled with MMS application that helps you share your favourite videos. You can also share the latest news and gossip through this application. The phone also lets you post your comments on social networking sites like facebook and twitter.

Listen to your favourite local stations on the built-in FM radio and keep yourself entertained on the go. You can also track the local news and latest music release just at your fingertips. Bored from the music played on air, you can switch on your music player and enjoy your favourite tracks stored in the handset. The Blackberry allows you play music at MP3, eAAC+, WAV and FLAC formats.
productAttributes.title: BlackBerry Curve 9220 Black
